parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The ID of the ARTC application. You can specify only one application ID. The ID can be up to 64 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, underscores (\_), and hyphens (-).

parameters.name: ChannelId
parameters.description: The ID of the channel. You can specify only one ID. The ID can be up to 64 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, underscores (\_), and hyphens (-).

parameters.name: DisplayName
parameters.description: The name of the RTMP stream. The name can be up to 40 characters in length.

parameters.name: ExpireTime
parameters.description: The validity period of the RTMP URL. Unit: seconds. The default value is 36,000 seconds, which is 10 hours.

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description: The ID of the user who ingests the stream over RTMP. The user ID must be different from IDs of other users in the channel. The ID can be up to 64 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, underscores (\_), and hyphens (-).
